about_the_game:
This is the original soundtrack of the game Dance Hero: More Jiggle. It contains the music produced especially for this game. If you are looking for music and you don't find it here, it means it is produced by third party and is commercially available on other stores. You can find the name and the performer of each song in the game from the pause menu and hovering above the location name when outside of the level.

Music was made by:

Main menu and map theme: Vasilena Valentinova
Monster Trap - Nino Gomez
Twerk Hero Twerk Tracks: Evgeny Enchev
Other Twerk and Trap Tracks - Alexander Kanev
